MenuItem.Title: translate("#LDS#Heading My Actions")
MenuItem.Condition: (GetConfigParm("QER\Policy") = "1" and exists("personinaerole", sqland( sqlcompareuid("uid_person", getuser()), "xorigin > 0 and uid_aerole in ( select uid_parentaerole from aerolecollection where uid_aerole in (select uid_aeroleruler from qerpolicy ))" ))) or (IsNull(GetConfigParm("QER\ComplianceCheck"), "0") = "1" and exists("personinaerole", sqland( sqlcompareuid("uid_person", getuser()), "uid_aerole in ( select uid_parentaerole from aerolecollection where uid_aerole in (select uid_orgruler from compliancerule ))" )))

MenuItem.Title: translate("#LDS#Auditing")
MenuItem.Condition: (ispreprop("QERPOLICY") or ispreprop("COMPLIANCE")) and exists("personinaerole", sqland( sqlcompareuid("uid_person", getuser()), "xorigin > 0 and uid_aerole in ('CAP-AEROLE-AUDITING-AUDITOR')" ) )
